title: Tech Talk. Episodes 15 & 16.
creator_credit: John Kyle, Allenog Pty Ltd and Channel 0\28
brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. There is also a segment on survival skills. Presented by Michael Schilberger, the topics covered:- traffic officer, fashion modelling, baker, how to use the CES part 3, rigger, timber worker/ sawyer, turf mangement/green keeping and finding an apprenticeship.
